channel.title: Stata on Political Science Research Methods
channel.description: Recent content in Stata on Political Science Research Methods

item.title: Example: Testing for measurement validity and reliability
item.description: Example: Racial Resentment Scale Racial resentment scale is commonly used to measure symbolic racism. The scale contains four items, for each question, respondents indicate whether they agree or disagree with the statement on a five-point scale. The question wording and the respective variable number as appeared in American National Election Studies (ANES) 2016 are given below: V162211: ‘Irish, Italians, Jewish and many other minorities overcame prejudice and worked their way up.
